# invalidArgument

**Type Property**

An invalid argument error.

## Declaration

```swift
static var invalidArgument: WatchKitError.Code { get }
```

## Discussion

WatchKit reports this error when you specify invalid settings for one of the system supplied interfaces.

## Accessing Error Codes

- **downloadFailed**: A download error.
- **mediaPlayerFailed**: A media player error.
- **recordingFailed**: An audio recording error.
- **unknown**: An unknown error.
- **applicationDelegateWatchKitRequestReplyNotCalled**: An unresponsive delegate error.
title: invalidArgument
